uk.org.taverna.scufl2.api.io
Interface WorkflowBundleWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
StructureWriter
public interface WorkflowBundleWriter

A writer for WorkflowBundles. Implementations specify workflow bundle formats (media types) that they can write.

Method Summary
 java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getMediaTypes()
          Returns the media types that this writer can handle.
 void writeBundle(WorkflowBundle wfBundle, java.io.File destination, java.lang.String mediaType)
          Writes a WorkflowBundle to a file with specified media type.
 void writeBundle(WorkflowBundle wfBundle, java.io.OutputStream output, java.lang.String mediaType)
          Writes a WorkflowBundle to a stream with specified media type.
 

Method Detail

Returns the media types that this writer can handle.

Returns:
the media types that this writer can handle

writeBundle

void writeBundle(WorkflowBundle wfBundle,
                 java.io.File destination,
                 java.lang.String mediaType)
                 throws WriterException,
                        java.io.IOException
Writes a WorkflowBundle to a file with specified media type.

Parameters:
wfBundle - the workflow bundle to write
destination - the file to write the workflow bundle to
mediaType - the media type to write workflow bundle in
Throws:
WriterException - if there is an error writing the workflow bundle
java.io.IOException - if there is an error writing the file

writeBundle

void writeBundle(WorkflowBundle wfBundle,
                 java.io.OutputStream output,
                 java.lang.String mediaType)
                 throws WriterException,
                        java.io.IOException
Writes a WorkflowBundle to a stream with specified media type.

Parameters:
wfBundle - the workflow bundle to write
output - the stream to write the workflow bundle to
mediaType - the media type to write workflow bundle in
Throws:
WriterException - if there is an error writing the workflow bundle
java.io.IOException - if there is an error writing to the stream
